trans-unit.source: Provides information about the WorldPay Payments Standard extension

seg-source.mrk: Provides information about the WorldPay Payments Standard extension

target.mrk: Poskytuje informace o rozšíření WorldPay Payments Standard

trans-unit.source: The WorldPay Payments Standard Extension to [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)]

seg-source.mrk: The WorldPay Payments Standard Extension to

trans-unit.source: The WorldPay Payments Standard extension lets you offer customers a convenient alternative to making payments through bank transfers or credit cards.

seg-source.mrk: The WorldPay Payments Standard extension lets you offer customers a convenient alternative to making payments through bank transfers or credit cards.

target.mrk: Rozšíření WorldPay Payments Standard vám poskytuje možnost pohodlné alternativy pro zákazníky pro provádění plateb prostřednictvím bankovních převodů nebo kreditních karet.

trans-unit.source: Not only that, payments made through payment services will typically land in your bank account more quickly.

seg-source.mrk: Not only that, payments made through payment services will typically land in your bank account more quickly.

target.mrk: Nejenom to, platby provedené prostřednictvím platebních služeb přijdou obvykle na váš bankovní účet rychleji.

trans-unit.source: If you enable the extension, and send a sales invoice or sales order by email, the document includes a link to the payment service in the email body and in the attached PDF document.

seg-source.mrk: If you enable the extension, and send a sales invoice or sales order by email, the document includes a link to the payment service in the email body and in the attached PDF document.

target.mrk: Pokud rozšíření povolíte a odešlete prodejní fakturu nebo prodejní objednávku e-mailem, bude doklad obsahovat odkaz na platební službu v těle e-mailu a v přiloženém dokumentu PDF.

trans-unit.source: A customer can choose the link, and then use the payment service to make the payment.

seg-source.mrk: A customer can choose the link, and then use the payment service to make the payment.

target.mrk: Zákazník si může vybrat odkaz a poté provést platbu pomocí platební služby.

trans-unit.source: Enabling payment service extensions is free in [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], however, you will need to contact the payment service to get an account.

seg-source.mrk: Enabling payment service extensions is free in [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], however, you will need to contact the payment service to get an account.

target.mrk: Povolení rozšíření platebních služeb je zdarma, v [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] pro získání účtu však budete muset kontaktovat platební službu.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Enable Customer Payment Through Payment Services](sales-how-enable-payment-service-extensions.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Enable Customer Payment Through Payment Services](sales-how-enable-payment-service-extensions.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte (odkaz) [Povolení plateb zákazníkům prostřednictvím platebních služeb](sales-how-enable-payment-service-extensions.md).
